name: Blighty Pluginator
author: Blighty

sections.description: This plugin monitors installed WordPress plugins on your installation. It notifies the admin (or other email) when updates are available. Plugins can be excluded from monitoring.
sections.installation:
• Install and optionally set a notification email address via the settings.
  • Optionally enable the “snapshot” feature. This monitors plugins and reports by email when they are activated or deactivated.
  • That’s it.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.4 – January 27th, 2024

  • Bug fixes and compatability with PHP 8.*

Version 1.1.3 – January 14th, 2017

  • Added functionality to send a warning email if this plugin is deactivated (providing snapshot mode is enabled).

Version 1.1.2 – January 11th, 2017

  • Minor bug fix.

Version 1.1.1 – January 7th, 2017

  • Improved “Snapshot” functionality.

Version 1.1.0 – June 18th, 2016

  • Added “Snapshot” functionality where you will be notified if any plugins change from activated to deactivated (or vice-versa).

Version 1.0.2 – March 22nd, 2016

  • Fix to ensure the plugin triggers at the correct point.

Version 1.0.1 – March 20th, 2016

  • Minor bug fix.

Version 1.0.0 – March 18th, 2016

  • Initial release.

short_description: This plugin monitors installed WordPress plugins on your installation for updates and notifies via email when they are available.
description: This plugin monitors installed WordPress plugins on your installation. It notifies the admin (or other email) when updates are available. Plugins can be excluded from monitoring.
